topic.title: 4chan is compromised
topic.body:
Sometime on April 2, 2020 there was a thread operation thing on /pol/ whose purpose was to put a banana on George Floyd's grave. While it was pretty retarded, it was completely legal. However, sometime between 9:50 and 10:30 PM central all threads were removed and my IP was banned for "replying to a raid thread". 

4chan jannies clearly have ulterior motives. The site is compromised.

1617149531_16badkisTTGDcQf3YmZ9ra8b9Pnha.body: I'm a lolbertarian who believes in race and IQ

1616953116_15cApprVFcr1skAkWssq5aAXKa7pD.body:
> [boot13](#comment_22_1PxMvud9KvbqaSZnV4piygA6dFTASwapHY): Stallman is a toxic asshole and the FSF board should all be removed for bringing him back.

you're gay

1617435563_1KZdUJK67R6bzE4w2tXQTvkKNfmsq.body:
> [croatame](#comment_21_19RaaMJeGXcJzLxeKXWH9pynfjgmm33VZS): The jannies power trip from Gamergate is what caused the exodus to 8chan. Only to find that the cultural authoritarian reach is much further than most thought.

I miss 8chan so much. I wish there were a decentralized version that everyone went to.

1616777685_1Qq4LP4T9LVbrnWLcUiQCXkMXJfPR.body: You sound like a fucking schizo. If you want, put your computer in a Faraday cage.

1570989643_1HFbnmQ8wBoYBNqZy2wVfyLg19v4W.body:
> [pwb545buser1](#comment_6_1CHMhcTKarWQHdrPpCv2QxGFaMwJSQ9KZT): it's to try to trick us in divulging ours :).

Why though?

1617530919_1qNWEDofNoMxA5vQoWoDeC6fZ5Dt6.body: If you actually do it make sure you tell the police about this place. We could use some media publicity.

1618183859_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body:
> [houtje](#comment_51_1HV7aMJLo3XMuij1h17kP12ZYvp1Y8EzvA): this article is a joke

What's wrong with Gab? I like it
